speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you doing today?

speaker: Customer
text: Hi Mark, I'm doing well, thank you. What’s this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m calling regarding a past due account with Prime Bank. Before we proceed, could you please verify your address?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that. Could you also provide your date of birth for verification?

speaker: Agent
text: Great, thank you for confirming your identity. You currently have a balance of $450 on your account.

speaker: Customer
text: Oh, I didn't realize it was that much. What are my options for payment?

speaker: Agent
text: You can pay the full amount today, or we can set up a payment plan for you.

speaker: Customer
text: I think I can pay $150 today and set up a plan for the rest.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds good. I’ll help you set up the payment plan for the remaining balance. Thank you for cooperating.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome. I’ll send you the confirmation of the payment details shortly.

speaker: Customer
text: Great, I’ll keep an eye out for it.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for your time today. Have a wonderful day!
